original_text: You may be like a strong bird that flies high. And you may make your home in the highest places among the stars. But I will bring you down from there.’ That is what the Lord says. You may be like a strong bird that flies high. And you may make your home in the highest places among the stars. But I will bring you down from there.’ That is what the Lord says. You may be like a strong bird that flies high.
korean_text: 네가 독수리처럼 높이 오르며 별 사이에 깃들일지라도 내가 거기에서 너를 끌어내리리라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: You may be like a strong bird
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 강한 새와 같을 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: And you may make your home
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신은 당신의 집을 만들 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: in the highest places among the stars
But I will bring you down from there
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 당신을 그곳에서 내려오게 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says
You may be like a strong bird
